body:
Comment 16: 
If you take a look in the attached fabs.c, you'll notice that there are a couple of
static global vars.  I've had luck in adding/subtracting them to try to move around the
location of the constant used in the fabs() inline implementation.  Note that I think
that if you add one, you'll need to use it in one of the functions to avoid having the
linker omit it.
